segments.text: I notice the boy balancing on the stool, reaching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He looks like he’s about to fall, but he’s determined to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is watching him, waiting for her turn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe the woman hasn’t noticed any of this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s just standing there, drying dishes like nothing is happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is pouring over the sink, and she doesn’t even react.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is absurd and dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the boy will actually fall or if he’ll manage to grab the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl seems so innocent, just waiting for her treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I’m watching a comedy of errors.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t look away, even though I probably should.
segments.speaker: PAR
